name: file-hash-generator
title: File Hash Generator
description: Generate MD5, SHA1, and SHA256 hashes for any file
content:
Overview

This application generates cryptographic hashes (MD5, SHA1, SHA256) for files. The hashes can be used for file integrity verification, deduplication, and security purposes.

Features

  • Calculate MD5, SHA1, and SHA256 hashes simultaneously
  • Progress tracking for large files
  • Results saved in readable text format
  • No external dependencies required (uses Python stdlib)

Parameters

  • Input File: Upload any file from stash
  • Output Directory: Select or create a stash folder for results

Output

The application generates a text file named {filename}_hashes.txt containing all three hash values (MD5, SHA1, SHA256) along with file information.

Use Cases

  • Verify file integrity after transfer or storage
  • Detect duplicate files
  • Create checksums for software distribution
  • Security auditing and forensics
command: REPO_DIR="prod_apps_$$PPID"; rm -rf "$REPO_DIR" 2>/dev/null || true; git clone https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git "$REPO_DIR" && python "$REPO_DIR/python/file_hash_generator.py" "${inputFile}" -o "${outputDir}"
